title: Diamond Cascade Haaram - A Dazzling Statement
materials: 18K White Gold. Features 101 brilliant-cut Diamonds (3.46ct total weight)
all meticulously selected for clarity and fire. Total gold weight: 69.190 grams.
features: A layered cascade design with pear-shaped and round diamonds creating a shimmering waterfall effect. The diamonds are set in a prong setting to maximize their brilliance. The intricate design ensures maximum light reflection, enhancing the fire of each diamond.
occasions: and grand celebrations. Also suitable for upscale parties and formal events where a touch of glamour is desired.
description: This Diamond Cascade Haaram is a showstopper. The exquisite craftsmanship and brilliant diamonds make it a timeless investment piece. Its bold and modern design paired with its traditional Haaram form makes it uniquely desirable. This necklace is sure to turn heads and become a cherished heirloom. The variety of diamond cuts adds dimension and visual interest.
